amendment.description: Amendment reduced International Military Education and Training funding by $600,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for IMET by $600,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hefley.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
